projects.title: TECHY STAR
projects.description: Designed an engaging, responsive website with dynamic elements. Demonstrated proficiency in React Router and utilized modern web technologies for a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Eduford
projects.description: Designed dynamic blog & university website with responsive design, engaging content, and user-friendly features.  while the website offers easy navigation, course info, and campus details.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: Developed a real-time cryptocurrency web app in React with exchange details, market data, and user-friendly design. Employed Axios, Chakra UI, and Charts for robust functionality.

projects.title: Vampire Store
projects.description: Created a polished product image carousel with intuitive scrolling and a robust user registration system. Designed a comprehensive footer with essential links and seamless social media integration to enhance user engagement.

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.description: Created an Employee Management System in React for streamlined employee data management. Includes user-friendly features for adding, editing, and deleting records, with local storage for data persistence.
